metadata.name: Configure System to Forward All Mail through a specific host
metadata.description:
Set up a relay host that will act as a gateway for all outbound email. Edit the file /etc/postfix/main.cf to ensure that only the following relayhost line appears: 
relayhost = {{{ xccdf_value("var_postfix_relayhost") }}}
metadata.rationale:
A central outbound email location ensures messages sent from any network host
can be audited for potential unexpected content.  Tooling on the central server
may help prevent spam or viruses from being delivered.

manual_remediation:
